about_the_game:
STORY

In a realm where medieval valor clashes with the menace of mechanical might, a small band of courageous warriors stand as the last line of defense against an encroaching evil. The tyrannical queen of a ruthless empire has launched a campaign to harvest the rare and magical Emerald Wood from the remote, enchanted forests. This precious resource is vital for constructing a formidable army of mecha and a colossal ship designed to explore the mysterious Far Reach Lands.

As the empire’s forces ravage the sacred groves, the only hope for salvation lies with a group of brave heroes.

Prepare for a gripping adventure where magic meets machinery, and only the bravest can stand against the dark forces threatening to consume everything. Are you ready to face the ultimate challenge? The world is counting on you and your allies.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Explore Story-Rich locations & characters in a unique SwordxPunk setting.

  • Hand-drawn, vibrant environments.

  • Choice-dependant, branching stories.

  • Travel to villages, towns and continents from across the world.

  • Battle ferocious Medieval-styled Mecha, Knights and Monsters!

  • Discover Enemy "Weaknesses" and utilize Magic Skills for Victory.

  • Equip the best Armor, Weapons and Accessories.

  • Discover and Summon formidable Monsters to fight at your side.

  • Unlock powerful "Fury Skills".

More Features

  • Hand-drawn anime cutscenes!

  • Build "Knowledge" points as you explore new towns and villages, use knowledge points to unlock hidden skills and side quests.

  • Outsmart your opponent in "Wit Battles" among other Mini-Games.

  • Add enemies to your Bestiary and discover enemy weaknesses and Bios.

  • Meaningful QTE "Moments" - (Quick Time Events)

  • Unlock additional and hidden "behind-the-scenes" game art as you progress.

  • Xbox Controller supported.

  • Experience an Original, Memorable and Lovingly made Soundtrack, inspired by a Classic JRPG sound!

Demo Prelude - COMING SOON!

Team-up with Uther, Tristan and Izzy as they embark on a dangerous train hijacking mission.

Battle the defenders of the train, plant your explosives and escape!

It should all go like clock work ... right?
